word: Jesus rested upon the wisdom and strength of His Heavenly Father. He declared, "The Lord God will help Me; therefore shall I not be confounded, . . . And I know that I shall not be ashamed. . . . Behold, the Lord God will help me." Pointing to His own example, He says to us, "Who is among you that feareth the Lord, . . . that walketh in darkness, and hath no light? Let him trust in the name of the Lord, and stay upon his God."
